vtt_data: 00:00:00 --> 00:00:05 Luke: Welcome to today's engineering sprint planning meeting. 00:00:05 --> 00:00:15 Sarah: Thanks, Luke. Let’s begin by reviewing the progress from the last sprint. 00:00:15 --> 00:00:30 Jason: I’ll provide an update on the backend development for the new feature.

summary.summary_overview: The team discussed the progress of the current sprint and planned for the next phase of development.
summary_details: Jason updated the team on backend development.
next_steps: Continue with the next sprint tasks.
